## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description | Type                                 | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | 设置按钮禁用      | `boolean`                            | `undefined` |
| `size`     | `size`     | 设置按钮大小      | `"default" \| "large" \| "small"`    | `undefined` |
| `type`     | `type`     | 设置按钮类型      | `"dashed" \| "default" \| "primary"` | `undefined` |
